mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t.IP_ADDRESS AS ipAddress, t.SCAN_TIME AS scanTime FROM sop_physical_asset_temp AS t LEFT JOIN sop_asset AS a ON t.IP_ADDRESS = a.IP_ADDRESS WHERE a.IP_ADDRESS IS NULL AND t.ASSET_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY t.SCAN_TIME DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.IP_ADDRESS) FROM sop_physical_asset_temp AS t LEFT JOIN sop_asset AS a ON t.IP_ADDRESS = a.IP_ADDRESS WHERE a.IP_ADDRESS IS NULL AND t.ASSET_STATUS = 1
